评论详情: The best work coat ever invented. I highly recommend this coat. It’s very warm very insulated. It’s very worth the money.

评论概述: Return took 3 weeks from this seller
评论详情: I ordered 2 of these and returned one. I like the coat. It runs a little large. I typically take a large and a medium in this fits good with a little room for layers. I returned one and dropped it off at Amazon at Whole Foods on Dec 31 and didn’t get a refund until Jan 18. It took nearly 3 weeks to get my refund (after looking that’s this sellers policy, not because it was slow). Longer than any other retailer and any other item I have purchased from Amazon. So if you’re unsure I would suggest finding a different seller on Amazon or purchase in a store.

Quality is great
My dad loved it!

Great cold weather jacket! Durable materials good fit nice style

This jacket looks handsome and tough! We got a tall size and it was definitely good for covering up a tall man. It’s pretty expensive because of the brand, but it gets the job done since it’s thick and heavy. It holds off water very well and was true to size. It was a little stiff at first but after some wear it was more comfortable. I gave it 4 stars bc it’s expensive in my opinion
Jacket fits big for a carhartt. Loose fit. Very stiff but will break in. Looks great and keeps me warm
Too big need a 2X instead of 3x
Good jacket. Good fit. The material is thick and tough. There will be a breaking in period but that's what you want in a jacket like this.
Jacket was made well and looked nice but was very large on my grandson. He is a large boy at 17. He is tall and broad at the shoulders,  but the jacket was very large.
I just received my Carhartt Artic Jacket today, I opened the package and there it was my jacket so I tried it on and it fits perfectly, woohoo I’m happy!! Thank you

Carhartt began replacing the word "cotton weave" for the word duck about 14 years ago because "duck" sells as thermal insulation duck down. Carhartt is referring to the outer shell of the jacket as duck, and marketing it in a dishonest way to sell duck jackets. This is very poor practice, but good salesmanship if you don't regard ethics. I'm would personally boycott Carhartt adds that claim "duck" insulation, and this particular add is as bold as many Carhartt adds sold by the brand itself even. Shame shame on you Carhartt.
This is a great coat.  It is quite stiff at first, but even so, it is warm and tremendous at blocking the cold December wind.  A great buy.
Bit bulky on the shoulders but great coat.

Lives up to the expected Carhartt quality. I expect it to outlive me. Not as warm as the warmest version, and exactly what I wanted. I can only wear the warmest when I visit Chicago in January. Seems a bit bulky, but plenty of room and not difficult to move around. Smart looking and I will wear it for business as well.

I bought this coat in the moss color in 2004 and have worn it every winter since, it's warm and the pockets are heavy duty which seems to always be the weak point in my previous coats. 20 years and it still looks great and has no holes or even any real wear. I do recommend buying the optional hood it's well worth the money. The only real downside is I want a new one in carhartt brown but I have a hard time buying a new one when the old one is still in like new shape.

Quality is very good, but it's super big.  I wear a XL normally.  (195#, 6') A large is still too big.If you want a lot of room, this is great.  However, if you want it to 'fit', it's close to two sizes large for my build.
6ft 230lbs, 2xl is a little big

I was surprised after losing my old carhartt that the new ones felt rougher and lighter. Although I understand it may need to break in I was shocked to feel the lack of quality and details such as lined pockets, and general heft. I miss my old carhartt..
This jacket not only is large but it’s extra huge. At least order at least a size smaller than what you normally would order. But a nice warmer jacket.
Best value.

I’ve owned this coat for six years & have worn it 8 times! I like the appearance, the zipper is outstanding quality but, it’s too big & it’s very, very stiff! I actually don’t like wearing it especially while in the car…it’s so stiff the collar reaches my eyes! I wouldn’t purchase again

Love my new Carhartt insulated traditional coat!  The waist tie inside allows custom fitting, the sleeves are also quilted lined and have wind breaking cuffs inside the sleeve, the courderoy collar is warm...I washed it twice and it softened right up and looks great!  The velcro tabs offer quick closing of the jacket without zipping it up.  I don't exactly like the large zipper and have put some silicone on it for smoother zipping.  I'm a 68 year old woman, 5' 8" 120lbs, and the Medium fit great.  I had previously ordered the small, but it was too tight under the arms and chest.

评论概述: this coat i believe is mis-marked
评论详情: i have been wearing 1x Carhart jackets forv 25 years or more.  this 1 is labeled as 1x but it fits like a 3x.  its just rediculously too big.  i also bought the matching 1x bib and that fits pretty good, so im guessing the jacket has the wrong label on it
Productive arrived promptly & fits well 6"4' Mtall fits great & can still wear a hoodie under.

At 59 years old I feel I can give Carhart a true honest review.  I’ve been in the natural gas construction industry for the last 6 years as an inspector, I’ve been in construction my entire working life and worn Carhart everyday.  From pants to tee shirts, socks, hats, beanies and jackets. I even owned an insulated vest. If you want gear that will last the test of time and hard work, Carhart will never let you down.  I’ve retired a good amount of all Carhart gear.  This jacket I bought because I like nice things and like to look professional in my inspection duties of the job sites.  Living and working in Northern Nevada near Lake Tahoe we’re on layoff for winter due to the high level of snow we get every year so a lot of us plow snow in the winter to stay busy.  This  jacket will be perfect with a hoodie under it, bought it 1 size to big on purpose just for that reason.  I used a can of water proofing on it to help keep me dry. One cool option on this jacket is it has snaps around the collar to add the canvas hood if I wanted to. The stitching is heavy duty and has plenty of pockets to keep what I need to carry safe. It has a pocket on the inside that has a zipper, just big enough for a sub compact conceal carry pew pew.  A valid expectation is this jacket lasting the next 10 years.  Well worth the money spent
Nice warm jacket. Pricey but worth it.
I like the jacket, but the zipper started to tear on the bottom. Didn't even wear it very much. Very difficult to zipper it up now.
Good

评论概述: Men’s jacket, but bought for woman
评论详情: I’m so tired of being cold that I bought this jacket for myself! lol It’s very warm! It’s a little stiff and needs to be washed a few times to be less stiff, but it’s very well made and will keep you really warm.
Great quality, rugged ranch coat! Warm and long enough to keep water and snow off you cantel!!

I was disappointed that style # 103283 had been discontinued. This is Carhartts replacement. It's definitely a 'more refined' fit. Less baggy, pockets don't hold as many beer cans as the previous style. Same warmth, just feels slightly cheaper in construction when held directly against the old model

I love the quality of almost all Carhartt products, this jacket is exactly what i expected and I'm definitely pleased with my purchase, now, i will say i noticed that underneath the back of the collar are three button snaps which are a clear indication to me that this jacket is designed for a detachable hoodie, and for $141.85 total cost (that's what I paid total after tax and all), I believe that small extra piece should have came with the jacket, that's just my opinion though, for $141.85 they could have just thrown in the detachable hoodie, other than that, great jacket,great quality, if you take care of it, it'll last you years and years to come. Thank you for taking the time to read my review, Happy Shopping.

This is a great quality coat.I have been wearing them for years.They are rugged,durable, and warmAlthough I must say the zipper quality seems to have gone downhill,but overall it's a great coat.  Thank you.:)
Zipper is junk compared to the 20 yr old coat it replaced. Disappointed with Carhartt.
I'd recommend washing several times before wearing to soften. Excellent quality.
6'4" 255lbs and XLT fits perfect with a little room for extra layers, (glad I didn't get the 2XLT)  I have long arms and thensleeves come down to my palm so this jacket keeps the arctic cold out

Hard jacket to find in stores locally!  This is husbands 3rd carhart traditional artic duck coat!  First one he tossed after twenty plus years, second one has become his working on greasy things jacket..like snowblowers.  He is retired and needed a new one. He is 5.10, 170 lbs.  has always worn the large regular but after I read reviews it said they run extremely LARGE.  I took a chance ordered the medium regular as he is shrinking slightly in stature with age.  What was sent to us was a medium loose fit.  Said reg fit on removable tag and loose fit on tag attached to jacket.  That was a good thing because it fits snugly enough at the bottom and a reg May have been too tight.Overall he is very happy and loves it…one of these years we may “ snowbird” and leave these cold northern NY winters!

This jacket might be fake because it does not hold up to the carhartt name. Poor quality and the zipper is ruined within the first month of ownership. Extremely unsatisfied with this and will not be purchasing another one. The jacket won’t even zip up properly.
Pefect item for someone who works outside. Had to go down a size.
It's as advertised, including the part about running big. I'm 6'3" and 210 lbs. I wear an XL normally, but the Large coat fits me perfectly.
The inside pockets are not large enough to hold my cell phone. My phone is an iPhone 14.  My old Carhart coat had bigger pockets. Come on do better!!!!
I wear shirt size XL so I ordered this in XL. When I got it and tried it on you could have put a second person in it.  Going to return
C003 is Big & Tall. The description does not say Big & Tall.
The quality was 100%. But the size ran 2× larger.  If u wear a size 3x, go two sixes smaller
It runs a little big.

I ordered this for my husband for Christmas and it arrived as ordered, but two days late. Upon opening the coat and trying it on, he realized that it was a bit too large. I returned the coat and an exchange was sent to me the very next day. It fits perfectly! It is a bit stiff when new, but I suspect that this is typical of this brand. It came well-packaged and was delivered very quickly. I am so pleased with this order, and my husband said the coat is very warm! We had temperatures of 2 degrees when he wore it and he said he was not cold in the coat at all. Great purchase, great price, delivered well. Just be mindful when ordering that perhaps it runs a bit large.

Like many reviewers have said, these run big. I am 5’10” 215 lb and I normally wear a 2x so I bought the 1x and it is still kinda big. That fine though because it leaves room for a hoodie. I believe I could actually wear the large. Very warm and sturdy, very stiff even after washing. The zipper is a bit challenging but I like being able to unzip from the bottom when driving.
I have had a Carhart Jacket for more than 5 years and it has held up so well.  Anyway I decided I wanted a new one and this one is perfect
I ordered my jacket through Amazon and it arrived on time and fits perfect.

My husband has worn Carhartt since he was young, and still does now that he’s past 60! He appreciates the quality and I love how well they wear. Bought this for my son, and I hope he finds Carhartt as dependable as his father does.

I've washed it twice and then followed online instructions of soaking it in cold water with vinegar to soften it up but it's still very stiff. we were kidding that we might use sticks and hit it for a few minutes like a pinata. Good value for a sturdy & warm jacket just be prepared for the break in period.

This is designed to crawl under a semi at 5 F below and replace a drive shaft after wearing multiple layers of close.

Too bad it doesn't include the hood for the jacket. I did have to exchange the 1st jacket for a smaller size. Vendor exchanged it without difficulty.

This coat is perfect. Especially with the separate hood. Im 6’2” 220 lbs . I purchased the xl tall. It runs really big, but I knowingly purchased it for this fact. Hubby loved this!!

I have the same version of this coat that was purchased 30 years ago. My "Large" from my working days was too snug now, so I sensibly bought an "extra-large", and it's big enough to go swimming inside of it. The problem is that the Post Office wants $85 to return the thing, so I'm better off trying to sell it locally to cut my losses on this unwearable coat. TRY ONE ON AT A LOCAL STORE BEFORE BUYING IT HERE, because if you don't get your size right, you're screwed out of $85

As described.

评论概述: poor quality zipper ,velcro  rather than snaps, will not buy any other carhartt products
评论详情: poor quality

I purchased this Carhartt Traditional coat to replace my 25+ year old Carhartt coat. The original served me well, but the sleeves were finally tattered. This version is the closest thing to the original, only better. It weighs less than the original but is still as warm. It has inner pockets while the original did not. Heavy duty metal 2 way zipper and 4 snaps to add a hood. My original Carhartt hood fits perfectly and is still in excellent condition, although it is faded now. I love the canvas exterior that is very durable. And it is the perfect length. I highly recommend this as your go to cold weather work coat.

评论概述: Two sizes too large and poor
评论详情: Appearance is nice but quality is low. Different than traditional Carhartt’s. When putting on sleeve the stitching was loose and caught my finger. Not comfortable for a sting to catch between your fingernail and finger. Bleeding is not good. The quality is just not there like the older styles. Will be returning.

评论概述: It's a Carhart so it's built to last
评论详情: Great coat.  Heavier / warmer than expected (a good thing).  Plenty of room for layers underneath as needed.  Only one complaint ... the zipper (heavy duty) is a bit of a struggle to start & zip.  I lubricated the teeth and that helped some.  Over time with use it will likely get better but zipper trouble makes me nervous (thus the 4 starts instead of 5).  I'd say I will try and update this review after a year's use but we both know that's not going to happen.
Perfect jacket, just what my husband wanted!
Traditional cotton Carhartt..Doesn't seem to be cheaply made as everything else tend to be ..Very pleased with my purchase.

评论概述: A bit larger but kind of what I expected.
评论详情: It’s a bit larger than I expected but very much enjoyed. You can wear a good bit of layers and still feel free. Great for winters. Although it isn’t very flexible.  I’m a larger man so xxl is pretty good for me with hoodies. With the jacket, it feels like a 3XL due to the amount of space. I personally enjoy it so I can wear layers underneath and take off the jacket if need be.  It definitely kept me warm and yet it feels breathable because you can adjust the bottom of the jacket to be tight or loose.  Flexibility is one thing, I haven’t had much time to break it in. Only had about two months of wear so far and the material is pretty stiff. So trying to work under a car or in tight spaces with the sleeve down makes it a bit challenging. Inside the sleeves is an elastic cuff so you can roll up the sleeve for a bit more room but it’s a heavier jacket and fall down occasionally.
I bought a dewalt heated coat but did not like carrying around battery and also wasn’t impressed with warmth so bout this instead and love it!!

评论概述: This is a loose fit so it will seem bigger.
评论详情: This is replacing a Carhartt artic jacket that I’ve been wearing since 1999. I wore my old coat to work today. Time will tell if this one will last as long. Zipper looks the same and the quality looks the same.
Fits big

High-quality jacket, like all Carhartt products. Had one just like this that lasted 25 years. Yeah, I squeeze every last day out of it. Good price, and super fast shipping. Warm and comfortable to wear the whole day during a Northeast winter. Highly recommend.  This one has two inside pockets that my old one did not.

评论概述: Product Quality is great but not the measurements
评论详情: Really impressed at the coat quality, style and durability.  I amd 6' 1", & 200lb and I normally wear 2XL due to broad shoulders, but in this case I bought an XL as per the chart measurements and customer feedback.  WRONG.  The XL was too big and looked awkward.  The sizing chart could be a lot better.  Also there is no explanation on when we should select the Tall option.  I am returning it, and will reorder the XL.  I was not At All impressed at the delivery times.  There was no compensation for delays in delivery dates.
Protege muy bien los fuertes fríos es un poco áspera de afuera pero pienso que es muy buena para el trabajo

It's comfortable, warm and very well made.  My ONLY criticism is the zipper.  I'm a bit on the portly side and trying to get the zipper together is a challenge.  To get the zipper started I have to pull it up to mid chest, get it started, then push it back down-- sort of like being five years old again.  Otherwise, GREAT.
Jacket was amazing, just too heavy and stiff
Arms seem to be long and the dbl zipper is nice but way to big. Sound like Santas sleigh bells when walking and not zipped up.
Bought it for hubby for Christmas and he loved it. Then we lost it in a house fire. Definitely will be getting another one.

评论概述: Dear Carhartt: line the pockets, please.
评论详情: Love this coat, but can’t get over the blunder that the main pockets aren’t lined! How is this? My arctic vest (worn under the coat) with the same general design complete with large patch pockets in front have an actual insulation-lining in the pockets. My Carhartt chore coat has a napped fabric lining their pockets. Why does this great coat (rated: WARMEST) have these large front pockets but only a thin layer of canvas protecting your hands from the cold? And lemme tell ya, your hands will get cold in these pockets. Carhartt, I know you read these reviews, please get on this and you’ll have yourselves a perfect coat. As always, you guys make the best.
Jacket is warm, let's no wind thru it, is comfortable.  Snag free material.  Wears like iron
I really like this coat from Amazon. This is considered my good coat. It’s nice to have. I like it.
Me agrado , materiales gruesos.
